2710822319292754514.Text: This clan above all disappears into the night. Not blessed with the magical powers we are given, they rely on stealth to claim their victims.

320572372212111172.Text: They are not unlike us in many ways. But, though gifted physically, they prefer the shadows, stalking their prey from the darkness. It is cowardly and weak, and they are not to be trusted.

21464866666427800.Text: We are the true masters of the night. Only we use our dark powers as they were intended. Sliding through the night, invisible in the shadows, we hunt our prey in secrecy and silence.
